name: AttributesTest
description: Unit tests for the Attributes class in Jsoup, focusing on attribute manipulation and iteration.

test_cases.name: html
test_cases.description: Tests the HTML representation and key manipulation functionalities of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorRemovable
test_cases.description: Tests the removable iterator functionality of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorUpdateable
test_cases.description: Tests the updateable iterator functionality of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorHasNext
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext functionality of the Attributes iterator.

test_cases.name: testIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the basic iterator functionality of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorSkipsInternal
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator skips internal attributes in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: iteratorThrows
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator throws a NoSuchElementException when next is called on an exhausted iterator.

test_cases.name: testListSkipsInternal
test_cases.description: Tests that the list returned by asList skips internal attributes in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: htmlSkipsInternals
test_cases.description: Tests that the HTML representation skips internal attributes in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator functionality on an empty Attributes object.

test_cases.name: testIteratorRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the remove functionality of the iterator in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorRemoveConcurrentException
test_cases.description: Tests that the iterator throws a ConcurrentModificationException when the underlying collection is modified during iteration.

test_cases.name: removeCaseSensitive
test_cases.description: Tests the case-sensitive removal functionality of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testSetKeyConsistency
test_cases.description: Tests the consistency of setting keys in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testBoolean
test_cases.description: Tests the boolean attribute functionality in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testSizeWhenHasInternal
test_cases.description: Tests the size functionality when internal attributes are present in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testBooleans
test_cases.description: Tests the boolean attribute handling in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: booleanNullAttributesConsistent
test_cases.description: Tests the consistency of null boolean attributes in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: booleanEmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of boolean attributes with empty strings in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: booleanCaseInsensitive
test_cases.description: Tests the case-insensitive handling of boolean attributes in the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: equalsIsOrderInsensitive
test_cases.description: Tests the order-insensitive equality functionality of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: cloneAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the Attributes class.
